Reviews.Title: Everything you need in a small package!
Reviews.Author: RooCat
Reviews.Content: is that up has everything that you need lots of RAM and a large hard drive, 750 gigabyte. It has plenty of room to store all of your programs and it runs Windows 8 .1 beautifully.all the programs you want to run like officescratch thatsuch as Microsoft Office fit very well and run beautifully on this machine. It has a beautiful touch screen monitor and it is so easy to use with Windows 8 .1 that you would never believe you used anything else. This is a very smooth and fast machine. Will be very happy that you purchased it I couldn't find anything couldn't do easily.I highly recommend this computer to anyone looking for and mid-size laptop with a huge capability.

ProductInfo.Features:
Processor: Intel® CoreTM i3-2377M Dual Core Processor (3M Cache, 1.5GHz) 17W
RAM: 6 GB (1x4GB + 1x2GB) | Hard Drive: 750GB 5400rpm
Optical Disc Drive: DVD Super Multi Burner | Operating System: Windows 8 x64bit
ProductInfo.Name: Acer Aspire V5-571-6672 i3-2377M 1.5GHz 6GB 750GB HDD 15" Laptop
